name: calculate_biorhythms
description: Calculates and displays a comprehensive set of biorhythms for a given date based on the individual's birth date and time. This includes the season, moon phase, solar cycle phase, and circadian tendency.

date.description: The current date and time for which to calculate biorhythms, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS'.

birth_date.description: The individual's birth date and time, used for calculating biorhythms, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS'.
